You are exceptionally dedicated, both to what you love and what you hope to achieve.
When you have a goal in mind, you'll stop at nothing to keep chasing it.
You aren't easily discouraged or deterred; you tend not to let minor setbacks get you down.
Additionally, you aren't shy about sharing your passion for what you love with others.
Of course, this can sometimes be a bit much for others if they don't share your interests.
It can also sometimes be difficult for you to determine when it's time to abandon something and try a different approach.
A passionate person like you will be...
